titles.title: There Is a Green Hill Far Away

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: There is a green hill far away, Without a city wall, Where the dear Lord was crucified, Who died to save us all.

verse.name: c
verse.lines: O dearly, dearly has He loved, And we must love Him, too; And trust in His redeeming blood, And try His works to do.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: We may not know we cannot tell, What pains He had to bear; But we believe it was for us He hung and suffered there.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: He died that we might be forgiv'n, He died to make us good, That we might go at last to Heav'n, Saved by His precious blood.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: There was no other good enough, To pay the price of sin; He only could unlock the gate Of Heav'n and let us in.
